sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Poisons that paralyze a target but leave higher cognitive functions intact (and do not kill the target) are difficult to create and administer. However, certain types do exist. This poison may only be introduced into a target via injection, as in an applicator or dart. Any sized dose has a Hard (3 difficulty dice) difficulty. The poison Stuns the target for 3 Rounds if the target fails the check. In addition, each threat generated inflicts one strain on the target, and the GM can spend 1 despair to make the target test against the poison again during the next round, as the poison remains in his system.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Synthetic Standard Neuroparalytic (1 dose)</name> <number>GEAR0001050</number> <price>75</price> <range/> <rarity>6</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:04:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>aceddb602f14a450e0f497eef699b618</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:04:22</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
